body:
Comment 1: 
On a Mac you definitely want GOOS=darwin.
I'm not sure you'll get much further on OS X 10.4, though.
Others have reported trouble with it, and there is low-level
code that might not work with it.  

https://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/t/c9ea63889d42e116
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Started**._
